Apéro Paradisi.name: Apéro Paradisi
Apéro Paradisi.ingredients: ramazzotti aperitivo rosato, grepefruit juice, dry white wine, still water, basil, ice
Apéro Paradisi.instructions: In aperitif glass with ice cubes, add 4 cl Aperitivo Rosato, 4 cl grapefruit juice and fill up equally with white wine and water. Garnish with basil.

Prosecco Maracuja.name: Prosecco Maracuja
Prosecco Maracuja.ingredients: passion fruit, pineapple juice, mineral water, cassis syrup, prosecco, sprigs of lemon balm, crushed ice
Prosecco Maracuja.instructions: Scrape out 1 and 1/2 passion fruit pulp with a spoon and pour into the glass with crushed ice. Mix the pulp with 5 cl pineapple juice and 5 cl mineral water. Slowly add 10 cl syrup over the back of a spoon. Add 2 branches lemon balm with 10 cl prosecco.

Hugo.name: Hugo
Hugo.ingredients: elderflower syrup, prosecco, lime, mint, ice
Hugo.instructions: Cut half a lime into pieces, squeeze and place it in the glass. Add ice cubes, mint leaves and 2 cl elderflower syrup to the glass and top up with 16 cl Prosecco.

Wild Berry Lillet.name: Wild Berry Lillet
Wild Berry Lillet.ingredients: lillet, wild berry schweppes, berries, ice cream
Wild Berry Lillet.instructions: Pour 5 cl Lillet into a glass with ice and top up with 10 cl Schweppes wild berry flavour. Finally, garnish with berries.

Mimosa.name: Mimosa
Mimosa.ingredients: champagne, orange juice, triple sec liqueur
Mimosa.instructions: Pour 7 cl champagne and 7 cl orange juice into a glass and add a few dashes of Triple Sec liqueur.

Bellini.name: Bellini
Bellini.instructions: Puree half a peach in a blender and pour into the glass. Pour in 7 cl Prosecco and add a few dashes of peach liqueur.

Lillet Rosé Citrus.name: Lillet Rosé Citrus
Lillet Rosé Citrus.ingredients: lillet rosé, lemonade, mint, ice cream
Lillet Rosé Citrus.instructions: Mix 4 cl Lillet and 9 cl lemonade in a shaker and pour into the glass with ice. Finally, garnish with mint.

Tequila Maracuja.name: Tequila Maracuja
Tequila Maracuja.ingredients: passion fruit, pineapple juice, mineral water, cassis syrup, lime, tequila, mint, crushed ice
Tequila Maracuja.instructions: Scrape out 1 and 1/2 passion fruit pulp with a spoon and pour into the glass with crushed ice. Mix the pulp with 5 cl pineapple juice and 5 cl mineral water. Slowly add 10 cl syrup with the back of a spoon. Pour in 3 cl tequila and squeeze 1/4 lime and add it to the glass. Garnish with mint.

Cuba Libre.name: Cuba Libre
Cuba Libre.instructions: Fill a glass with ice cubes. Add 8 cl white rum and lime juice from 1 lime to the glass and top up with cola. Finally, garnish with a slice of lime.

Amaretto Sour.name: Amaretto Sour
Amaretto Sour.ingredients: amaretto, lemon juice, orange juice, ice
Amaretto Sour.instructions: Mix all ingredients (5cl Amaretto, 3 cl Zitronensaft and 2 cl Orangensaft) vigorously in a shaker with ice and pour through a strainer into a glass with new ice.

Aperol Mulled Wine.name: Aperol Mulled Wine
Aperol Mulled Wine.ingredients: rosé wine, aperol, sugar, clove, vanilla, rhubarb
Aperol Mulled Wine.instructions: Heat 15 cl rosé together with 15 g sugar and spices (1 clove and 1 vanilla pod)  in a saucepan, add the frozen rhubarb and leave to infuse for a while over a moderate heat. Finally, add 4 cl Aperol.

Mojito.name: Mojito
Mojito.ingredients: white rum, citro, lime, brown sugar, mint, crushed ice
Mojito.instructions: Add 1 chopped lime to the glass together with 1 tea spoon sugar and mint (tip: mint should be mashed first). Crush everything in the glass with a pestle. Add crushed ice to the glass, pour in 5 cl rum and top up with soda.

Caipirinha.name: Caipirinha
Caipirinha.instructions:
Add 1 chopped lime to the glass together with 2 tea spoons sugar. (Crush everything in the glass with a pestle.
Fill the glass with ice and pour 5 cl cachaça over it and stir with a spoon.

Long Island Ice Tea.name: Long Island Ice Tea
Long Island Ice Tea.ingredients: vodka, white rum, tequila, gin, cointreau, lime juice, cola, ice
Long Island Ice Tea.instructions: Pour all ingredients (2 cl vodka, 2 cl white rum, 2 cl tequila, 2 cl gin, 2 cl cointreau, 2 cl lime juice and 14 cl cola) into a glass with ice and stir.

Negroni.name: Negroni
Negroni.ingredients: gin, campari, red vermouth, ice, orange slice
Negroni.instructions: Pour all ingredients (3 cl gin, 3 cl Campari and 3 cl red vermouth) into a glass with ice and stir. Garnish with half an orange slice.

Cosmopolitan.name: Cosmopolitan
Cosmopolitan.ingredients: orange liqueur, vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice, crushed ice
Cosmopolitan.instructions: Mix all ingredients (1 cl orange liqueur, 3 cl vodka, 3 cl cranberry juice and juice of 1 lime) in a shaker and pour into a glass with ice. Finally, garnish with lime, if desired.

Margarita.name: Margarita
Margarita.ingredients: tequila, orange liqueur, lime juice, salt, crushed ice
Margarita.instructions: Garnish the rim of the pre-chilled glass with lime juice and salt. Fill the shaker with ice, add the ingredients (3 cl tequila, 1 cl orange liqueur and 2 cl lime juice) and shake vigorously. Pour the drink through a sieve into the glass.

Tequila Sunrise.name: Tequila Sunrise
Tequila Sunrise.ingredients: tequila, lemon juice, orange juice, grenadine, ice
Tequila Sunrise.instructions: Fill all ingredients except grenadine (4 cl tequila, 1 cl lemon juice and 11 cl orange juice) into a shaker with ice and shake vigorously. Pour the drink through a sieve into a glass with ice and carefully empty the grenadine into the glass over the back of a spoon. Can be garnished with a slice of lemon or orange.

Sex on the Beach.name: Sex on the Beach
Sex on the Beach.ingredients: vodka, peach liqueur, cranberry juice, orange juice, ice
Sex on the Beach.instructions: Mix all ingredients except orange juice (4 cl vodka, 2 cl peach liqueur, 4 cl cranberry juice) in a shaker with ice and pour into a glass with new ice (through a streiner). Top with orange juice and garnish with orange/pineapple slice/cocktail cherry if desired.

Bloody Mary.name: Bloody Mary
Bloody Mary.ingredients: vodka, tomato juice, lemon juice, drops of worcestershire sauce, drops of tabasco, salt, pepper, ice
Bloody Mary.instructions: Pour all liquids (6 cl vodka, 15 cl tomato juice and 2 cl lemon juice) into a glass with ice and season with sauces (2 drops Worcestershire sauce and 5 drops Tabasco) and spices. Stir well with a spoon and garnish with a celery stick if desired.

Daiquiri.name: Daiquiri
Daiquiri.ingredients: white rum, lime juice, sugar syrup, ice
Daiquiri.instructions: Mix all ingredients (5 cl white rum, 3 cl lime juice and 1 cl sugar syrup) vigorously in a shaker with ice and pour through a sieve into a pre-chilled glass. (Tip: For fruity daiquiris, replace sugar syrup with fruit syrup and add pureed fruit).

Applecake.name: Applecake
Applecake.instructions: Pour 2 cl vodka and 2 cl apple juice into the glass and spray a topping with cream. Then sprinkle cinnamon over the cream for decoration.

Mini-Beer.name: Mini-Beer
Mini-Beer.instructions: Pour 3 cl liqueur into the glass and slide 1 cl cream over the back of a spoon onto the liqueur.

Mad Dog.name: Mad Dog
Mad Dog.instructions: First pour 1 cl grenadine into the glass and add 4-5 drops Tabasco. Slowly pour 3 cl vodka into the glass over the back of a spoon.

Fallen Froggie.name: Fallen Froggie
Fallen Froggie.instructions: Pour 3 cl melon liqueur into the glass and slowly add 1 cl Baileys over the back of a spoon. Finally, drop a few drops of grenadine into the shot.

Washing Machine.name: Washing Machine
Washing Machine.instructions: Pour 2 cl Blue Curacao and 2 cl lemon juice into two separate glasses. First put the Blue Curacao in the mouth and then, without swallowing, the lemon juice. Then mix the mixture in the mouth (like mouthwash).

Sour Tongue.name: Sour Tongue
Sour Tongue.ingredients: whisky, melon liqueur, orange juice, lime juice, ice
Sour Tongue.instructions: Shake 1 cl melon liqueur, 1 cl lime juice and 4 cl orange juice with ice in a shaker. Pour the mixture into the glass and let 1 cl whisky flow slowly into the glass over the back of a spoon.

Skinny Bitch.name: Skinny Bitch
Skinny Bitch.ingredients: vodka, lime juice, sparkling water, ice
Skinny Bitch.instructions: Fill 4 cl vodka into a glass filled with ice. Squeeze in 16 cl fresh lime juice and top it up with sparkling water. You can garnish it with a lime wedge.

Manhattan.name: Manhattan
Manhattan.instructions: Give all ingredients (6 cl whisky, 3 cl vermouth, 2 dashes of bitter liqueur) in a cooled martini glass.
